backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature-evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the site.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling screen progression and rendering all game screens with theme and sound providers.
frontend/src/game/audio/SoundProvider.ts: Context provider managing sound effect toggling and generating simple Web Audio API tones for UI events.
frontend/src/game/components/Achievement: Toast component showing timed achievement notifications with trophy icon and text.
frontend/src/game/components/ChoiceMiniG: Reusable multiple‑choice mini‑game component handling choices, correct/incorrect feedback, retry, and continuation.
frontend/src/game/components/LootChest.t: Displays an interactive loot chest that reveals loot items and a continue button after opening.
frontend/src/game/components/PixelHearts: Renders floating animated heart emojis across the screen with randomized positions and delays.
frontend/src/game/components/RewardToast: Shows a temporary toast with an icon and message when triggered.
frontend/src/game/components/SoundToggle: Button that toggles game sound on or off using the sound provider.
frontend/src/game/components/UnlockSeque: Sequentially displays unlockable text items with optional badges and a final message before completing.
frontend/src/game/flow.ts: Defines screen identifiers, their navigation flow, and a helper to get the next screen.
frontend/src/game/GameShell.tsx: Layout wrapper applying background, glow effects, and a sound toggle around game content.
frontend/src/game/screens/BootScreen.tsx: Simulates a loading sequence with staged messages before showing a start button.
frontend/src/game/screens/EndingAchievem: Shows a final achievement screen with animations, rewards, and decorative hearts.
frontend/src/game/screens/FakeLoading.ts: Displays a fake loading bar with rotating status messages and animated indicators.
Presents a proposal sequence with yes/try-again logic, animated hearts, and final progression.
frontend/src/game/screens/index.ts: Exports all screen components for centralized access within the game flow.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level1OriginSt: Uses UnlockSequence to present story beats about how the relationship began.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level2MemoryAr: Shows a sequence of shared memories using the UnlockSequence component.
Lists reasons the player is liked and triggers a reward toast before advancing.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level4SupportM: Renders Level 4 support mission with themed text moments and an UnlockSequence that triggers onAdvance when completed.
frontend/src/game/screens/LobbyScreen.ts: Displays the game lobby UI with player info, mode, a teammate request, and a START MATCH button invoking onAdvance.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame1Defus: Implements a choice-based mini-game themed around defusing a bad day, using ChoiceMiniGame and calling onAdvance on success.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame2LootC: Shows a LootChest mini‑game that grants a single loot item and advances when opened.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame3Penal: Provides a penalty kick–style choice mini‑game where selecting the correct option triggers onAdvance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth, login flow, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables, game UI classes, and animations for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radius, animations, and enabling additional plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the game concept, requirements, features, and needed assets.
